CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose

real-time multi-person pose detection for body, face, hands, and feet

View on index

Related repos

  • whole-body pose estimation with two-stage distillation, supports multiple models and integration with ControlNet
  • Detects and recognizes faces in real time
  • 3D markerless kinematics from 2D videos
  • Unified model for photogrammetry subtasks
  • Unified benchmark for scene text detection and recognition
  • 3D human pose from Wi-Fi signals
  • 2D and 3D face analysis toolbox with recognition, detection, and face swapping
  • Realtime hand detection in the browser
  • Unified API for face analysis and deepfake detection
  • Monitors posture via webcam and sends notifications
